documentation.text: @dev sends the token incentives to curve gauge votes for the next vote cycle/period
@dev returns the remaining number of votig cycles that the contract can vote for with current token balance

sendBribe(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: sends the token incentives to curve gauge votes for the next vote cycle/period

votesLeft(address,uint256).details: returns the remaining number of votig cycles that the contract can vote for with current token balance
